mapper.select: SELECT SEQ , FILE_NAME , SERVER_FILE_NM , FILE_PATH , CASE WHEN FILE_LENGTH > (1024 * 1024) THEN CONCAT(ROUND(FILE_LENGTH / (1024 * 1024)), 'MB') WHEN FILE_LENGTH > 1024 THEN CONCAT(ROUND(FILE_LENGTH / 1024), 'KB') ELSE CONCAT(FILE_LENGTH, 'byte') END AS FILE_LENGTH , FILE_TYPE , DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DATE, '%Y.%m.%d. %H:%i') AS REG_DATE , DEL_YN , ID , WEB_PATH FROM WEBHARD_FILE A WHERE 1=1 AND DEL_YN = 'N' AND WEB_PATH = #{webPath} ORDER BY SEQ DESC
